features: Weather protection: Mountains dish out weather as randomly as a lunch counter lady. Luckily, the softshell fabric of this cap sheds wind and moisture, without overheating
Foldability: If you ever thought carrying a big hat is a big hassle, think again. This full brim hat folds conveniently into a pocket or pouch
Durability: The lightweight softshell fabric will stand up to more nicks and cuts than you will, so punish it all you want
Elastic band adjustment: Elastic band that adjusts the cap to your head without being too tight
DWR treatment: Durable Water Repellent treatment sheds water and snow
